name: Lambance Rig
text: Exhaust (use 1 flash): Choose a path card. That card gains illumination until the end of the turn. [FOC] + [reason] (use 1 flash): Distract with a brilliant flash of light to exhaust a being.

name: "Lucky" Cloak
text: Exhaust: When you would suffer 1 or more fatigue, draw a challenge card and resolve the following effect based on its icon: [sun] Soothe that amount of fatigue instead. [mountain] Prevent that fatigue. [crest] Suffer 1 additional fatigue or discard this gear.

name: A Frog this Way Comes
text: Choose one: Exhaust X path cards. Shuffle a path card with X or less presence into the path deck. Then search the General set for a Fractal Frog and shuffle it into the path deck.

name: The Shapeshifter
text: Friendly. Persistent. Unique. Exhaust: Shuffle a being attached to this biomeld into the path deck. If that being was a predator, add 3[harm] to another being. If it was a prey, add 4[progress] to another being. Otherwise, exhaust another being. If there is not a being attached to this biomeld, it gains the following test: [AWA] + [connection]: Suggest a new form to attach a non-human being from the path discard facedown to this biomeld. Then exhaust this biomeld.

name: Grasp of the Verdessa
text: Manifestation. (To play a manifestation, discard 1 token from a conduit.) Add 1[harm] to a flora to place a path card on top of the path deck. If that card is a biomeld, place it on the bottom of the path deck instead.

name: Silaro's Fastidiousness
text: Attach to a Ranger's equipped gear. Response: After a Ranger succeeds at a test from the attached gear, if it cleared a being, scout 1 path card. If it cleared a feature, add 2[progress] to the location. Otherwise, scout 1 Ranger card.

name: Fate of the Reclaimers
text: If you have a weapon equipped, add 3[harm] to a being. It fatigues you. If it fatigues you for 2 or more, add 2 additional [harm].
flavor: The reclaimer invasion has reached its nadir, and they appear to be dying off. You wonder, however, if they have simply gone dormant and will one day return.

name: Rebreather
text: Setup. Exhaust (use 1 filter): When you interact with a water card, commit 2 effort. This gear cannot be discarded or returned to your hand by path card effects.

name: Gus the Mole
text: Friendly. Persistent. Unique. Exhaust: Look at the top card of the path deck. Add [progress] equal to its presence to another path card in play that shares its card type. [FIT] + [connection]: Nuzzle your little friend to ready this being and soothe 1 fatigue.

name: Portable Generator
text: Attach to a feature. Exhaust: The attached feature gains illumination until the end of the turn. Then, if it's a machine, add 1 power to it.
flavor: You took this device from Orlin's Vault not knowing how truly useful it would be.

name: Wanderer Spirit
text: Friendly. Persistent. Unique. Spirit. [FOC] + [exploration]: Navigate [2] alongside the spirit to add [progress] to this being equal to your effort. Then you may move your [ranger] to a feature in the same area.
mountain_challenge: You may exhaust this spirit to move up to 3â—­ from it to the location.

name: Expedition Logbook
text: [FOC] + [exploration] (use 1 entry): Consult observations on the arcology to add 1[progress] to a feature for every 2 effort. If that feature is a ruin or machine, add [progress] equal to your effort instead. Then, read [guide] 197.

name: The Ambition of the Estians
text: Move a feature. It fatigues you. Then add [progress] to that feature equal to your fatigue.
flavor: The Estian's vision for their arcology was grand. Not only could it house hundreds of thousands, but its inhabitants were tasked with inventing new technologies that would preserve their legacy.

name: Ren Kobo's Hat
text: Unique. Exhaust: When you suffer 1 or more fatigue, add an equal number of [progress] to the location. Response: If you have 1 or less fatigue, discard this gear.

name: As Above, So Below
text: Each Ranger can move their [ranger] to a being, feature, or the location.
flavor: After exploring every inch of the subterranean chambers of the arcology, and encountering no small number of wondrous beings, you've come to understand that there is no place on Earth that is not home to multitudinous life, be that under the sun, or below its surface.

name: Lunn's Door Opener
text: Setup. Exhaust (use 1 cell): When you interact with a machine, commit 2 effort. [FOC] + [reason] (use 1 cell): Interface with a device to add 1 power to a machine for every 2 effort.

name: Stripe, Loyal Lutrinal
text: Friendly. Persistent. Unique. Exhaust: Discard 3[progress] from this being to resolve a challenge effect on a being. [AWA] + [exploration]: Chase [2] the scampering lutrinal to add 1[progress] to a feature for every 2 effort. Then add an equal amount of [progress] to this being and move it.

name: Carried by the Wind
text: Manifestation. Attach to a feature or location. When you Traverse the attached card, dodge all obstacles. If you fail, prevent the injury and return this manifestation to your hand.

name: Archivist Spirit
text: Friendly. Persistent. Unique. Spirit. [SPI] + [reason]: Reflect [2] on the spirit's wisdom to add [progress] to this being equal to your effort. Then scout 1 challenge card.
crest_challenge: You may exhaust this spirit and discard 3[progress] from it to place all fatigue you suffered this test on the bottom of your Ranger deck.

name: Call the Scuttlebus
text: Response: Before you decide to travel, if there is 2[per_ranger] or more [progress] on the location, you may travel (regardless of the location's [progress] threshold). If there is 5[per_ranger] or more [progress] on it, travel to a location up to two paths away. Use the terrain of the second path when building the path deck.

name: Quisi's Lantern
text: While this card has at least 1 gleam remaining, within reach is illuminated. Exhaust (use 1 gleam): When you perform a test, dodge each card within reach.
flavor: You hold the lantern aloft and "Slugmond" squirms, emitting a warm glow.

name: Echoes of the Estians
text: Attach to a path card. Exhaust: When a Ranger performs a test that interacts with the attached card, commit 2 effort. This test can be performed without commiting energy.

name: Repllant Spores
text: Setup. Exhaust (use 1 puff): When you interact with a flora, commit 2 effort. [FOC] + [reason] (use 1 puff): Release a cloud of spores to exhaust a flora.

name: Bursting with Life
text:
Manifestation.
Choose a flora and either remove 1[harm] from it or add 2[progress] to it. Then add 4[progress] to a non-biomeld being in the same area as the chosen flora.
flavor: Ever since you delivered the mysterious seed to its destination, you have discovered a new kinship with the Valley's plant life, and a new source of wisdom.

name: Memlev Hammock
text: Deployed: When you add 1 or more [progress] to a being, increase the [progress] added by 1. When you add 1 or more [progress] to a feature, decrease the [progress] added by 1. This gear gains the following ability: Response: When you rest, soothe 2 fatigue.

name: Mycelial Incense
text: You can Connect with flora features. Exhaust: After you successfully Connect with a flora, soothe 1 fatigue. If that flora has the mycelial keyword, add [progress] equal to your effort to each other flora with the mycelial keyword.

name: Gardener Spirit
text: Friendly. Persistent. Unique. Spirit. [FIT] + [connection]: Tend [2] to the land alongside the spirit to add [progress] to this being equal to your effort. You may discard 1[harm] from a feature. If it is a flora, soothe 2 fatigue.
sun_challenge: You may discard 3[progress] from this spirit and exhaust it to choose a nature card in your discard and add it to your hand.

name: The Audacity of the Estians
text: Choose a Ranger to soothe all of their fatigue. Then that Ranger places an equal number of cards from their hand facedown on top of their fatigue stack in any order.
flavor: The Estians feared no limitation and heeded no boundary; as evidenced by the biomelds that yet roam the Arcology ruin.

name: Flowsteel Lithophone
text: Exhaust (use 1 tune): After you play a moment or attachment, soothe 1 fatigue. If that card is a tale, gain 1 energy matching that card's aspect.
flavor: Crafted by Tollin Lang, this lithophone is capable of rich, vibrating tones that resonate deep within, supplying listeners with a profound sense of well-being.
